questions.question: What is the empirical formula of SDMOF-1?
What is the maximum temperature SDMOF-1 can withstand before decomposing?
How does SDMOF-1 achieve C2H2/C2H4 separation?
questions.answer: SDMOF-1 achieves C2H2/C2H4 separation through a molecular sieving effect, utilizing its pore size and multiple interactions.

questions.question: Is the C2H2 adsorption capacity of SDMOF-1 higher at 273 K or 298 K?
questions.answer: The C2H2 adsorption capacity of SDMOF-1 is higher at 273 K.

questions.question: True or False: SDMOF-1 has a higher selectivity for C2H4 over C2H2.
What is the C2H2/C2H4 selectivity of SDMOF-1 at 298 K and 1 bar?
What method was used to determine the binding energy for C2H2 in SDMOF-1?
questions.answer: Periodic density functional theory (DFT) calculations were performed.

questions.question: True or False: SDMOF-1 can produce high purity C2H4 directly from C2H2/C2H4 mixtures in breakthrough experiments.
What is the role of the bicyclic alkane in SDMOF-1?
questions.answer: The bicyclic alkane in SDMOF-1 supplies several inwardly oriented hydrogen atoms that provide multiple interactions for C2H2.

questions.question: True or False: The C2H2 uptake ratio of SDMOF-1 is lower than that of NOTT-300.
What is the crystal system of SDMOF-1?
True or False: SDMOF-1's framework is single interpenetrated.
What is the BET surface area of SDMOF-1?
True or False: SDMOF-1 has a higher C2H2 adsorption capacity at 303 K compared to 273 K.
What is the isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) for C2H2 in SDMOF-1?
How many cycles of separation performance were tested for SDMOF-1 in the breakthrough experiments?
True or False: The separation potential (ΔQ) of SDMOF-1 is less than 20.
What is the breakthrough time for C2H2 in SDMOF-1?
True or False: SDMOF-1's structure is based on SiF6 2- anion pillars.
What is the role of bipyridine (bpy) in the structure of SDMOF-1?
questions.answer: Bipyridine (bpy) acts as a pillaring agent, connecting the layers into a 3D structure.
